meanings.definition: The part of the body on both sides of the backbone between the lowest (false) ribs and the hipbones.
meanings.sent1: She felt a sharp pain in her eloins after lifting the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined the bruise on her eloins carefully.
meanings.sent3: During the game of tag, she tried to protect her eloins from being tagged.
meanings.sent4: The dancer moved gracefully, emphasizing the strength in her eloins.
meanings.sent5: The weightlifter focused on strengthening his eloins for better performance.

meanings.definition: To hide; to keep out of sight.
meanings.sent1: He tried to eloins his excitement about the surprise party.
meanings.sent2: The spy had to eloins himself in the shadows to avoid detection.
meanings.sent3: The cat eloins behind the curtains when it heard the vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: She eloins her true feelings behind a smile during the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The treasure hunter eloins the map in a secret compartment for safekeeping.
